title: Devasena Studs - Traditional Kempu & Diamond Earrings
features: Featuring a floral motif meticulously handcrafted with traditional `nakshi` work. The central design showcases cabochon-cut rubies and emeralds set in a `jadau` style. Surrounded by meticulously set polki diamonds in an open setting that allows the light to enhance their brilliance. Intricate gold filigree work adds a delicate and airy feel to the earrings.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to embrace your traditional roots. Suitable for both day and evening wear.
description: These earrings are a perfect blend of tradition and elegance, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship. The use of high-quality natural rubies, emeralds, and polki diamonds enhances its value and beauty. The intricate nakshi work and Hyderabadi polish are hallmarks of authentic South Indian jewelry, ensuring a timeless piece that can be passed down through generations. Comfortable and lightweight for extended wear.
